sentences.en: Schizophrenia is not a "split mind" as is popularly believed.
sentences.cn: 精神分裂症并不是普遍认为的“分裂了的精神”。

sentences.en: Susan had a mental breakdown and was diagnosed with schizophrenia.
sentences.cn: 苏珊精神崩溃，被诊断为精神分裂。

sentences.en: One of the most common symptoms of schizophrenia is hearing imaginary voices.
sentences.cn: 精神分裂症最常见的症状之一是幻听。
